author: uschindler
msg: LUCENE-2352: In flex we change also the encode/decoder for numeric fields (NumericTokenSteam) using BytesRef. So we should verify that an old index (from version 3.0 on) is still using the same encoding, so all values are able to load into FieldCache and NRQs work

author: jleroux
msg: In order to fix issues after issues, I commit this patch from Sascha Rodekamp that fixes "Allow to open a layer lookup from a layer lookup" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3446) - OFBIZ-3446
This patch does not fix an issue with calendar in layered lookups. So I will create a new Jira for that.

Also it introduces a small drawback: you can't no longer close a layered lookup with the right left cross button. But Esc. is still working, so it's not a blocker. I will have a look at this and if needed will create a new Jira

author: jplevyak
msg: TS-281: fix compilation errors, also fix several other instances of long instead of intptr_t
also increment cache disk magic to get a auto-clear because of format changes in
URL.h, and comment the layout of the various HdrHeap bits including URL.h
Lastly, fix a minor problem with Cache::scan when using per-host partitions for
